column4: hi all, i have a bluetooth headset with some buttons on it, they're volume up/down and a universal "answer" button. what i want to do is make the answer button do things.
read the documentation that came with the headset ... ?
there wasn't any. and i looked it up onlie, it's pathetic, it roughly tells you how too pair with a phone and says "Not windwos compatible" (no the spelling error is not a mistake)
read the documentation that came with the headset ... ? maybe ?
